title: Christmas Tree And Menorah Conrolled By Tweets
teaser: Twitter users around the world can turn on and off lights at a holiday display in New Jersey. Tweet #brilliant#twinkle to @Oxmasâ€”Tree to light the display and tweet #figgyypudding to turn them off.
